sourcesContent:
<template lang="html">
  <v-dialog v-model="dialog">
    <template v-slot:activator="{ on }">
      <v-btn color="primary" dark v-on="on">Add New</v-btn>
    </template>
    <v-container>
      <v-card>
        <v-form  @submit.prevent="onSubmit">
          <v-row class="pa-2">
            <v-col :cols="9">
              <v-text-field
                label="Enter a name for your model portfolio"
                single-line outlined dense
                v-model="newPortfolio" />
            </v-col>
            <v-col :cols="3">
              <v-btn type="submit" color="primary">Add</v-btn>
            </v-col>
          </v-row>
        </v-form>
      </v-card>
    </v-container>
  </v-dialog>
</template>

<script>
import { apiService } from "@/common/api.service.js";
export default {
  name: "AddPortfolioName",
  data() {
    return {
      newPortfolio: "",
      dialog: false,
    };
  },
  props: {
    userID: {
      type: Number,
      required: false,
    }
  },
  methods: {
    getUserID() {
      if (this.userID != null) {
        return [this.userID];
      } else {
        return [];
      }
    },
    onSubmit() {
      if (this.newPortfolio != null) {
        let endpoint = `/api/portfoliotemplates/`;
        apiService(endpoint, "POST", {
          name: this.newPortfolio,
          auto_created: false,
          template: true,
          allowed_users: this.getUserID(),
        }).then(data => {
          this.$emit("add-portfolio", data);
          this.newPortfolio = null;
          console.log(data);
          this.dialog = false;
        });
        if (this.error) {
          this.error = null;
        }
      } else {
        this.error = "You must enter a name for the new portfolio.";
      }
    }
  },
};
</script>
